name: OR_LNLG_ARR_THERAP
description: This table contains the Arrival Therapies information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: ARR_THER_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The location at which the arrival therapy was performed.

columns.name: ARR_THER_ITEM_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID as to why arrival therapies were used. Arrival therapies are typically medications the patient is on when they arrive to the unit.
